response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for both of us. Given its significance, I propose a special introductory offer of $9,500 for you to consider. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $10,000 to you, at a highly competitive price. I believe this offer will not only benefit you financially but also align with our mutual interests. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
